name: Metal Frontline Tank 3D
description:
Metal Frontline Tank 3D!!!
Enjoy this tank driving game – a real gift for all who loves battle simulators! Be the real tank commander, join the military assault, defeat enemy’s tanks, aim carefully and shoot without fear! Ensure the victory of your army forces and crash the enemy’s frontline like a steel storm!
Features:

- stunning 3D-graphics like real battle
- Impressive visual, animations and sound effects
- Modern tank units
- Multi levels with amazing and addictive missions
- improvement and upgrading of combat equipment;
- Ice Age battle map with snowy mountains and plan full of ice
